about_the_game:
Desert Stalker puts you in control of a seasoned antiquity scavenger, a man whose main objective is finding rare objects in the ruins of civilization. When you uncover an artifact capable of not only informing the past but also shaping the future, everything changes.

Make major decisions about how you interact with the world around you, enter into erotic relationships, and live with the consequences of either dominating or saving both the people and landscape of post-apocalyptic Egypt.

Choose your path

Desert Stalker offers a Adult Visual Novel experience featuring a richly developed story that is full of characters to care about and stakes to invest in.

Enjoy the tale being told while also helping shape it through high-impact decisions and narrative choices that will determine how people perceive you and how you mold the world at large. Choose to win people over the old-fashioned way or simply take what you want.

Your story, your pace

The game features traditional linear storytelling sequences as well as free-roam elements that give players control over which quests to pursue.

Whether you want a gritty dystopian adventure or a harem simulator that focuses on the women of the Desert Stalker universe, the game will conform to your preferences.

Desert Stalker is filled with cinematic sequences, music, and sound effects designed for added immersion.

Personalize your playthrough

Optional content filters give you the tools to tailor your Desert Stalker experience as you see fit.

Leave your mark

Decide how you behave in an AVN that gives you unique opportunities to dominate the world around you and experience the ultimate gritty, dystopian fantasy.

Relax with your harem

Tired of the wasteland? You can unwind in your living room and enjoy the company of your household's members and servants.

Dig into the lore

Enjoy an in-game library that contains lore about the Desert Stalker universe, giving you an enhanced look at the world around you.

Revisit the highlights

Check out the integrated scene gallery, which will keep you coming back to watch your favorite scenes over, and over, and over.

highlighted.name: Remember me, but let me go

content_descriptors.notes:
Desert Stalker contains a large variety of (optional) adult content. The player can choose to entirely avoid most erotic encounters, or choose how to approach them.
The sexual content presented can vary between romantic and forceful (forceful content may include stronger themes such as power dynamics and coercion). 

In your adventures you may encounter cruelty, romance, violence, mild abuse, nudity, sex, sexual violence, (optional) incest and (optional) impregnation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

name: Desert Stalker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or OpenGL 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step in the shoes of the titular Desert Stalker, and scour the wasteland for artifacts and erotic encounters in this acclaimed Adult Visual Novel where your choices shape the game’s story. Dive into a world filled with grit, sex, and unparalleled power fantasies.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
